downloadTitle: Windows PowerShell script to delete all on-premises metadata from the Office 365 search index
downloadDescription: Download this Windows PowerShell script to delete on-premises metadata from the Office 365 search index.
detailsSection: In a cloud hybrid search solution, the cloud Search service application crawls your on-premises content and pushes the metadata to the Office 365 search index. We recommend that you test the cloud hybrid search solution with a small content source first. After the test, you may want to delete the metadata for all the on-premises test items from the search index in Office 365. If the deletion fails, there might be on-premises orphan items left in the search index in Office 365. To remove ALL on-premises items from the Office 365 index, run the Windows PowerShell script Delete-CloudHybridSearchContent.ps1.
systemRequirementsSection: The file is a zipped folder that contains a Windows PowerShell (ps1) file.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Copy the download to your computer, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: deleting metadata for all on-premises items in the Office 365 search index
